title: chestcommands插件
author: Maruend
txt_content:
求解决方法

replies.author: one_
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 one_ 于 2020-6-14 10:35 编辑 

manuaddp Maruend chestcommands.open.菜单.yml
后台输入这个指令后看看能不能打开菜单如果可以打开菜单，那么请输入以下指令
mangaddp builder chestcommands.open.菜单.yml
mangaddp builder chestcommands.item.菜单.yml

mangaddp default chestcommands.open.菜单.yml
mangaddp default chestcommands.item.菜单.yml

然后看看玩家是否能够打开菜单
